indication: Cough, fever, shortness of breath - rule out pneumonia

findings.summary: Right lower lobe infiltrate consistent with pneumonia
findings.lungs: Patchy opacity in right lower lobe. No pleural effusion. Left lung clear.
findings.bones: No acute fractures. Mild degenerative changes in thoracic spine.

impression: Right lower lobe pneumonia. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended. Follow-up imaging in 4-6 weeks to ensure resolution.

findings.summary: Interval improvement in right lower lobe infiltrate
findings.lungs: Decreased density in right lower lobe compared to prior. No new infiltrates.

impression: Improving right lower lobe pneumonia. Good response to antibiotic therapy.
recommendations: Continue current treatment. Repeat imaging only if clinically indicated.

indication: Atrial fibrillation, chest pain - evaluate cardiac size

findings.summary: Mildly enlarged cardiac silhouette, lungs clear
findings.heart: Cardiothoracic ratio 0.52 (mildly enlarged). Left atrial enlargement noted.
findings.lungs: Clear lung fields bilaterally. No effusion or edema.

impression: Mild cardiomegaly with left atrial enlargement, consistent with chronic AFib. No acute cardiopulmonary process.
recommendations: Echocardiogram recommended for detailed cardiac assessment.

findings.summary: Normal bowel gas pattern, no obstruction
findings.bowel: Normal distribution of bowel gas. No dilated loops or air-fluid levels.
findings.organs: Liver and spleen normal in size. Kidneys symmetrical.

impression: Normal abdominal radiograph. No evidence of obstruction or perforation.
recommendations: Clinical management as appropriate. No further imaging indicated at this time.
